name: WPB Category Slider for WooCommerce – Product Categories Carousel Slider & Grid with Icon and Images
author: wpbean

sections.description:
This plugin helps you to show the WooCommerce product categories slider in different style with different contents. It allow you to add custom icons to each product category and show the icons in slider. It support couple of different content type for the category slider.

Live DEMO | Support Forum | Documentation | Pro Version

Plugin Features:

  • WooCommerce Product Category Slider or Grid.
  • Category Slider with Category Icon.
  • Category Slider with Category Image.
  • Category Slider with Sub Categories.
  • Slider Loop and Autoplay.
  • Material Design, Responsive and Modern Design.
  • Shortcode System.
  • Setting Panel for Color Customize.
  • All Modern Browser Support.
  • Translation & RTL Language ready.
  • Very Lightweight & many More

Pro Version Features:

  • Show the categories slider with couple of different CSS3 hover effects.
  • Show any of your custom taxonomy or category instate of the product category in slider.
  • Category icon picker with couple of different icon packs.
  • Category Slider with Category Image Background, Icons, Sub Categories, button etc.
  • Super easy ShortCode builder for generating customized slider ShortCodes.
  • Priority support to our support forum.
  • Free installation if you need.
  • Free CSS customization if you need.
  • Tested with most of the popular premium WordPress themes.

You may also like our some other WooCommerce plugins

WPB WooCommerce Products Slider | WPB WooCommerce Related Products Slider | Woocommerce Image Zoom | WooCommerce LightBox | WooCommerce WooCommerce Custom Tab Manager
sections.installation:
• Install it as a regular WordPress plugin

  • Before install the plugin make sure you have WooCommerce plugin installed already.

Method 1 (Upload):

  1. Go to your WordPress admin then go to Plugins > Add new > Upload

  2. Then select the installable file fom you download folder.

  3. Upload and active the plugin and you are ready to go.

Method 2 (FTP):

  1. Upload the plugin to your server plugin directory and make sure you don’t upload the zip file.

  2. Then go back to your WordPress admin and go to Plugins > Installed Plugins

  3. If you successfully upload the plugin You will find WPB WOO Product Slider here.

  4. Active the plugin and you are ready to go.
sections.faq:
How to show the slider?

Use this plugins shortcode for showing the slider.

Where to get the ShortCodes?

Go to our documentation site or Plugin info page for getting the shortcodes.
